document.full_text: the espionage turned fraud scandal that has dogged renault for months took a new turn on tuesday as french media aired secret recordings of one of the automaker's executives begging its former security boss to help it "get out of this mess."
document.title: renault talks about "mess" get aired
lines_and_colors: the espionage turned fraud scandal that has dogged renault for months took a new turn on tuesday as french media aired secret recordings of one of the automaker's executives begging its former security boss to help it "get out of this mess."
